name: Horse Jumping Adventure Travel: Real Archer Horse Ridging & Racing Champion
name_original: Horse Jumping Adventure Travel: Real Archer Horse Ridging & Racing Champion
description:
Horse Jumping Adventure Travel : Real Archer Horse Ridging & Racing Champion a best fun and challenging adventure game where you are riding a horse and you have to clear all the hurdles / obstacles to win this horse run game. Each time your horse cross a hurdle you score some points. Beautiful track decorated with Lush green plants and grass beside the river with excellent graphics which you will surely love while playing this best horse racing animal simulator game of 2016.
To cross various types of hurdles / obstacles you have to press the jump Icon that will appear on your screen as soon as horse starts running BUT keep in mind being not able to timely press the jump button you will not be able to cross that hurdle and ultimately your horse will fell down.

Horse Jumping Adventure Travel : Real Archer Horse Ridging & Racing Champion is same like other Horse jumping & racing games and Horse racing champion, offroad derby horse riding games, crossing hurdle games with horse racing features. This game is a super fun horse adventure travel game on App store.Horse Jumping Adventure Travel : Real Archer Horse Ridging & Racing Champion is an exhilarating arcade and addictive sports game to play which challenge your skills of Horse Racing while crossing the hurdles. Game is best and Number 1 Jungle Horse racing and adventurous game on App store and we are sure you will love it to play again and again.

This horse racing & horse jumping run simulator game is full of FUN, Excitement and challenges.
